title: Swallows and Amazons!
name: Swallows and Amazons!
description:
A Map by Citycyclist

Locations for most of the books.

properties.name: Birding
properties.description: Posted by Citycyclist The Swallows, Amazons, D\'s and Captain Flint are sailing in the Outer Hebrides when Dick spots what he thinks is a pair of rare birds nesting on a loch. The rest of the tale is everyone\'s effort to head off the evil collector who wants to capture, kill and display the birds

properties.name: Coot Club
properties.description: Posted by Citycyclist Dick and Dorothea meet up with the Coot Club, learn to sail, and save some birds and some Hullabaloos.

properties.name: Dastardly deeds
properties.description: Posted by Citycyclist The D\'s help the Coot Club, victims of a plot to make them look guilty of loosing boats from their moors. They sail around the Broads, barely keeping ahead of foes. It all ends very satisfactorily.

properties.name: Gold mining
properties.description: Posted by Citycyclist Swallows, Amazons, and D\'s form a mining company to search for gold on the High Topps. They fight off claim jumpers as well as a wild fire.

properties.name: Hiding from the Great Aunt
properties.description: Posted by Citycyclist The Great Aunt\'s sudden arrival at the home of the Amazons forces the D\'s to camp out on their own, remaining hidden from her and risking getting the entire neighborhood into trouble.

properties.name: North Pole
properties.description: Posted by Citycyclist One of the Amazons is in quarantine with mumps; the others meet Dorothea and Dick (the D\'s) for adventures in an igloo and in learning semaphore while they wait for the lake to freeze and for the end of the quarantine. The story ends with a desperate race in a blizzard, to see who is first to the Pole.

properties.name: Oops!
properties.description: Posted by Citycyclist While anchored near Harwich, the Swallows slip their mooring in a fog and drift out to see, then manage to survive a storm and sail to Holland. For me, this is the scariest book of the series, because for the first time there are no adults nearby to help out.

properties.name: Secret Water
properties.description: Posted by Citycyclist Swallows and Amazons unite to explore and map uncharted territories by sail and by foot, with the aid of eels and mastodons.

properties.name: Swallowdale
properties.description: Posted by Citycyclist While the Swallows\' ship is in port for repairs (after being stove in), they camp in a hidden dale. The Amazons, meanwhile, are captives of a strict Great Aunt.

properties.name: Wild Cat Island
properties.description: Posted by Citycyclist Here the Swallows first cross paths with the Amazons and Captain Flint, the start of the series. Camping and sailing galore!
